name: live_notification
description: Manages email notifications sent to users based on certain events or conditions.
summary: In ServiceNow, the "live_notification" object typically refers to the functionality that allows real-time alerts and updates within the platform. This feature is designed to enhance user experience by providing immediate notifications regarding changes, updates, or important information related to various tasks and records. These notifications can be customized and targeted to specific users or groups, ensuring that relevant information is communicated promptly and efficiently. The live_notification object is crucial for maintaining smooth and responsive operations within the ServiceNow environment, enabling users to stay informed and act quickly on critical updates.
